name: Twitter2imgur
tagline: Twitter2Imgur is a small Windows/Linux app for quickly grabbing the images posted to a Twitter account and uploading them to an Imgur account.
body:
### About
Twitter2Imgur is a small Windows/Linux app for quickly grabbing the images posted to a Twitter account and uploading them to an Imgur account. It was designed for screenshots shared from a PS4 (full 1080p versions), but is not specific to that purpose. It is written in [Free Pascal/Lazarus](http://www.lazarus-ide.org/).
 
### Download

### Change Log
* Version 1.01 (16 Feb 2015)
  * Reversed the order images are uploaded in
  * Added F5 keyboard shortcut for Update
* Version 1.0 (6 Nov 2014)
  * Initial release.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
